content: Very interesting thoughts. I have always wondered why we don’t have a painless and safer way to make babies. It can be a possibility in future although it seems difficult to imagine right now. I have some more questions for the future. Will there still be inequalities based on race and gender — considering money becoming irrelevant and governance becoming efficient? It is likely that AI can also be biased because they are created by us. Will there be gender? Can people choose to be gender-neutral? Will religions continue to exist? How will beliefs related to God and religion change?
